react_01_react_task_management_dashboard.name: React Task Management Dashboard
react_01_react_task_management_dashboard.description: Create a comprehensive task management dashboard
react_01_react_task_management_dashboard.prompt:
Create a React task management dashboard with the following features:
- Task list with add, edit, delete functionality
- Task status tracking (todo, in-progress, completed)
- Priority levels (low, medium, high)
- Due dates and reminders
- Search and filter capabilities
- Responsive design with Material-UI or Tailwind CSS
- Local storage persistence
- Drag-and-drop task reordering

Requirements:
- Use React hooks (useState, useEffect)
- Implement proper state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper form validation
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add loading states and error handling
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_02_react_e-commerce_product_galler.name: React E-commerce Product Gallery
react_02_react_e-commerce_product_galler.description: Build an e-commerce product gallery with filtering
react_02_react_e-commerce_product_galler.prompt:
Create a React e-commerce product gallery with:
- Product grid display with images and details
- Category and price filtering
- Search functionality
- Shopping cart with add/remove items
- Product details modal
- Pagination for large product lists
- Wishlist functionality
- Product comparison feature
- Responsive mobile-first design
- Smooth animations and transitions

Requirements:
- Use React Router for navigation
- Implement context or Redux for cart management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper error boundaries
- Ensure accessibility features
- Add skeleton loading states
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_03_react_real-time_chat_applicatio.name: React Real-time Chat Application
react_03_react_real-time_chat_applicatio.description: Build a real-time chat application with WebSocket
react_03_react_real-time_chat_applicatio.prompt:
Create a React real-time chat application with:
- Multiple chat rooms support
- Real-time messaging with WebSocket
- User online/offline status
- Message typing indicators
- Emoji support and reactions
- File/image sharing capabilities
- Message search functionality
- User profiles and avatars
- Message read receipts
- Responsive chat interface

Requirements:
- Use WebSocket for real-time communication
- Implement proper authentication flow
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include message persistence
- Ensure security best practices
- Add error handling for connection issues
- Implement proper state management
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_04_react_weather_dashboard.name: React Weather Dashboard
react_04_react_weather_dashboard.description: Create a weather dashboard with API integration
react_04_react_weather_dashboard.prompt:
Build a React weather dashboard with:
- Current weather display for multiple cities
- 7-day weather forecast
- Interactive weather maps
- Weather alerts and notifications
- Temperature unit conversion (Celsius/Fahrenheit)
- Weather history and trends
- Beautiful weather icons and animations
- Location-based weather detection
- Sunrise/sunset times
- Weather data charts and graphs

Requirements:
- Integrate with OpenWeatherMap API
- Use Chart.js or similar for data visualization
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Implement proper error handling
- Include loading states
- Ensure responsive design
- Add accessibility features
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

react_05_react_social_media_dashboard.name: React Social Media Dashboard
react_05_react_social_media_dashboard.description: Build a social media analytics dashboard
react_05_react_social_media_dashboard.prompt:

- Ensure data privacy and security
- Add comprehensive error handling
- Implement content filtering
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features

vue_01_vue_task_management_app.name: Vue Task Management App
vue_01_vue_task_management_app.description: Create a task management app with Vue 3 Composition API
vue_01_vue_task_management_app.prompt:
Create a Vue 3 task management application using the Composition API with:
- Task creation, editing, and deletion
- Drag-and-drop task organization
- Task categories and tags
- Progress tracking with visual indicators
- Deadline management with notifications
- Team collaboration features
- Advanced filtering and search
- Dark/light theme toggle
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Local storage and API integration

Requirements:
- Use Vue 3 Composition API throughout
- Implement Pinia for state management
- Add data-testid attributes for testing
- Include proper TypeScript support
- Ensure accessibility compliance
- Add smooth transitions and animations
expected_features: Complete implementation of all specified features
